author: Special Correspondent
text:
Rotary club members at the Perunthalaivar Kamaraj Government Boys High School in Muthialpet —Photo: Special arrangement

The Rotary Club of Pondicherry Cosmos has built modern toilets at the Perunthalaivar Kamaraj Government Boys’ High School in Muthialpet.

The Rs. 6 lakh project funded by Rotary Club of Pondicherry Cosmos for building 14 latrines at the school was executed under the Rotary global grant with the help of Vaiyapuri Manikandan, chairman of the Puducherry Road Transport Corporation.

Dr. C. Gunasegaran, Rotary District Governor, Rotary Cosmos president Marie Susai Raj and Rotarians Visweshwaran and Joseph Suresh Kumar were among those who participated.
title: Rotary club builds new school toilets
